definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: Ramadan would spend summers there, doting on the locals, he adds.
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，拉馬丹將有花，夏季，當地人溺愛。

sentences.english: Muslims around the world are marking the start of Islam's holy month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的穆斯林紀念伊斯蘭神聖的拉馬丹齋月開始。
